review_text: Will ne useing annette's listing again. And telling friends and family
House was clean and decorated great! AC was cold and worked great! Beds and pillows were comfortable. We only stayed one night, but stay was great!
Thank you for hosting us!
I would stay there 1 million times in a row if I could.
Great, spacious home! So much room to spread out & relax here! Cool decor, comfortable beds & furniture, nice appliances. Would definitely stay here again!
An amazing place! Highly recommend!
Great house and location. More space than we needed but it was such a good deal we couldn't resist. We would stay here again.
Very spacious, perfect for what we needed, very clean and extremely comfortable beds!
Great place to stay in Shreveport and really nice location!
This is our second stay with Annette. We absolutely love her place, plenty of room to spread out and in a wonderful location. We just will not stay with anyone else, if we can help it.
The home was everything we expected and more. The beds were comfortable and the home was clean…but the location was perfect and absolutely beautiful.
This place was so nice. Very roomy and in a quiet, beautiful neighborhood. Very close to lots of restaurants and shops, too.

Had a wonderful stay. The house was well furnished with lots of interesting touches, beautiful rugs, plenty of room, and well supplied with everything needed, and then some. Enjoyed walking in the nearby park. Quiet neighborhood located a short drive away from shopping & restaurants.

This is a very roomy home with a genuine "lived in" feel. Eclectic old nick nacks and artwork in living areas coexist with thoroughly modern appliances in the well-appointed kitchen. Enormous fenced in back yard. A truly interesting home.

This was a great place. The backyard and enclosed patio for our two Goldendoodles was worth every penny. Soft beds and lots of room. We were hauling a 12 ft trailer and the parking was a pull in half circle . It was easy in and out; we parked right at the front door. Thanks Annette for an excellent experience!
Annette’s house was great and she was an excellent host. Very clean and plenty of space.
Traveling for work— place was great! Thanks!
Thank you, Annette for the wonderful stay your place was great and the neighborhood was beautiful with old homes well kept and manicured lawns.
Very spacious and eclectic. The beds were amazingly comfortable!!
Great place to stay! Recommended!

Perfect location/great space for our family this past weekend. Loved the multiple rooms/beds to spread out and kitchen has everything you could need. Even had some waters and ice in the freezer for us. Well stocked with Kleenex, toiletries, garbage bags, dish soap etc. It rained quite a bit during our stay so we didn’t get to enjoy the large yard as much as we would’ve liked. Great park and restaurants close by. Easy to get around. It is an older house, as are most in this area, but has a lot of charm! Annette was very helpful and excellent communication.

Comfortable place to relax and chill for a few days. Close to downtown Shreveport. Quiet neighborhood. Felt safe to walk the dogs at night. If we were to ever return to Shreveport, would likely look here first for our stay.
Great location in the heart of town. Easy access to everything.
The beds were very comfortable & clean. House was very spacious & comfortable.

I'm sorry just now seeing your text. There are a few things that I would like to speak with you about.
First, we thought that your house was really nice. We really enjoyed how spacious it is. We also liked the fact that you had plenty of towels for us to use.
Second, there are a few things that we think that needs to be addressed that we believe will make it a better experience for your clients. When we arrived at your property the back door was not completely closed and locked. Most importantly and urgent the sliding door would not lock. We tried several times to get it to lock but it wouldn't. There was and issue with the shower in the main bathroom. There is also a gaping hole in the wall next to the sink.
I hope that you don't think that I'm being overly critical I just wanted to offer my feedback. Overall we enjoyed our stay at your property.
Thank you

We really enjoyed staying at Annette’s home. I love the Highland neighborhood being close to almost anything you could want to do in Shreveport/Bossier. The bed in the master bedroom is super comfortable and once you’re in it you’ll never want to leave. All of the instructions were very clear and we were very happy with our stay. We would definitely stay again.

I use air bnb a lot because I travel with my dogs and a lot of times, my grandmother. Annette’s houses are home. You feel like home when you walk in, no matter the time of day or night, it just feels like you belong there. This particular house is very retro which I love! I rarely leave a review- because they are rarely to the attention and quality of Annette’s homes :) Hope to see you next time!

We really enjoyed our stay. The beds we very comfortable, the whole house was clean. Lots of room. I think the showers need some attention. I really hope to rent from Annette again in the future. I definitely recommend this place.
Beautiful home and a great location. House was much larger than we expected and very clean.

We loved our stay at Annette home. It was in a nice safe neighborhood, super clean upon arrival, and Annette was quick to respond while being super helpful with any need we had. I highly recommend her home to anyone staying in Shreveport.
This is the best Airbnb I have stayed in.. Plenty of room and bed sleeps comfortably.. Nice setup!!

I really enjoyed my stay at Annette's place. Great older neighbor with some beautiful and unique homes. I am a female was traveling solo for work and felt very safe. Annette's home was unique and welcoming. I felt right at home.
Annette’s home was very clean great location extremely spacious neighborhood nice and quiet had all essential that was needed
This is a great, cozy place to stay in town!
Neighborhood was fantastic. The house was very comforting and had a "at home feeling".
This place felt just like home! Great host! Answered any questions I had very quickly! Very quiet and safe neighborhood. Will absolutely be back.
Great place to stay! Annette was really nice and friendly.
Annette was so welcoming and made my Mom and I feel very comfortable. Loved the beautiful princess Eva as well.

House was nice and clean. Ms. Annette is very friendly and accommodating. I felt very at home and was able to cook and wash clothes whenever I wanted. I was offered food every time she cooked. I'm a dog person but even if you're not little miss Eva doesn't get in your personal space. Overall great experience and I would definitely stay again.
We booked our stay here while we were renovating a house in a diff city in La. Didn’t regret it one bit.
My husband enjoyed his stay and would stay again. Easy to access and great space.

To say the least this was my best ever experience with airbnb , im so grateful to have found this hidden gem and Shawn was a top tier host , cant wait to book my next stay. It was home away from home for me!!!
Shawn’s place is awesome really cozy nice and clean! Very safe, self check in was smooth and easy! Would definitely be back here to visit!

This Airbnb was perfect to say the least..it’s very clean and nicely decorated..very quiet and lovely neighborhood within driving distance of places to eat and shop..really close to the casinos..i would like to recommend a vanity mirror other that..I’d definitely stay again if in town and it’s available..
What a great place! Easy to find, great safe neighborhood and close to everything. The place is perfect and decorated so cute. Everything you need for a nice relaxing stay! I will be back!
Everything was super nice and clean
Extremely clean. Exactly what we needed for our stay.
Would definitely recommend and book this place again!
This is the 3rd time we have stayed at Shawn’s place! We feel right at home and it’s always squeaky clean!
A great cosy place to visit Shreveport. Right beside the golf course and close to everything you need.
Would stay again , enjoyed the location for what we needed
This is our second stay with Shawn! We love this place… Shawn is extremely responsive and the place is spotlessly clean!!!

The place was kinda hard to find at first since it was behind the main house and it was hard to see the house number, but once we found it, everything was great! Very clean, felt safe, and the bed was very comfortable!
Booked the place quickly and was quickly accepted! The place was very cozy, clean and private. I felt very comfortable at this place. Will stay again when in Shreveport!
We will be back! Super clean!!! Very very responsive!!! Thank you for your hospitality!!!
Everything is always great! Love this place.

We are repeat guests. In the past we would try a different place every time. Now we ALWAYS come back here. It's our only home away from home in Shreveport! It's peaceful, private, very clean, comfortable, and near everything! Also, Shawn is an excellent host!

Great little place to get away. Everything was great and located in what appears to be a very nice area. Plenty of places close by for shopping, food and everything else. Even pretty close to the casinos. We had a great time and will be staying again in the future.
Nice place!

Used this place for several months while working a project in the area. The host was very accommodating, the house was spotless, the neighborhood quiet and perfect for what I needed. Will definitely stay again when I'm in the area!

Shawn was an excellent host! He resides on the property, so he was able to provide immediate assistance when we arrived. The property feels like home and it was just what we needed for a weekend getaway. This property is a hidden treasure that I will definitely keep on my list of options in Shreveport/Bossier.
my favorite place to stay in Shreveport...very accommodating and perfect location!
thank you much
My favorite place to stay in Shreveport! Convenient, quiet and a great host!
Great place. Will come back for sure !!
One of our favorite places to stay when in the area...great location and Shawn is very responsive and accommodating!
Shawn’s place is so peaceful. I absolutely love staying here when I’m in town.

Shawn’s place was perfect for me as I was visiting my dad at the rehabilitation hospital. The neighborhood was quaint and quiet and the home had everything I needed.
Shawn was also very responsive to communication. He was kind and informative.
Overall, I had a great experience!
Place is awesome, quiet area, beautiful decor

This was a great weekend getaway. Everything was perfect Shawn was a great host and was very helpful when we made a mistake with the check in date. He made sure we were taken care of. We would absolutely come back and recommend this home
Great host, very responsive when we needed assistance. Definitely will book again!
Beautiful area and the space was just what we needed. Would definitely stay again!
Host is great! Very quiet; beautiful home and neighborhood! Will definitely rent again!
Would stay here again. Beautiful place in person. The bed was very comfortable and I have a hard time sleeping away from home but I slept great here.
always my top favorite-clean, peaceful, safe, and quiet.
This was a very nice and pleasant place! It had everything we needed! It was very close to everything too!

My husband and I are repeat visitors to Shawn's BAFB, close to Hospitals, Broadmore Paradise. First, I want to say that Shawn is the BEST host. He is extremely quick to reply and accept our reservation and is extremely accommodating to our every need.
We feel that this is the JEWEL of Shreveport AIRBNBs. We really rather stay here than any other place. It is in a very quiet neighborhood, but close to everything; behind the main house, and still very private; plenty spacious and has everything we would need.
Everything is neat, clean, and tastefully decorated. The sofa is so comfortable, I wish we had one like it at home.
Since AIRBNB considers anything below 5 stars a bad experience, please always give Shawn a 5-star. It is WELL deserved. If I could give it more than 5 stars, I would.
We definitely plan to stay here again when in Shreveport, if it's available.
THANKS again, Shawn!

This was our very first Airbnb stay and I think we’re hooked. This apartment was perfect, had everything needed to feel comfortable. Cute neighborhood, felt safe, the apartment was clean.
If we ever have a need to be in Shreveport again, we will check to see if Broadmoor Paradise is available! Thank you Shawn.
Location as described. If arriving at night you will struggle to find the location, be prepared. It’s a later check-in time with an earlier check-out time.

Everything was exactly as described.
Clean, centrally located, safe!! I never worried about anything while there!!
Will be booking again in the near future!! 10/10✨⭐️

Overall wonderful stay! Shawn was very friendly and attentive to ay needs I had and was fast to respond. Nestled in a peaceful neighborhood and the check-in/out process was seamless. Bed was super comfy. Highly recommend for future customers!
Shawn was a wonderful host and helped to accommodate us. I appreciated his clarity in his communication and kindness. Great location for our extended family. Definitely stay again.

This was my first Airbnb and it was the best first impression ever! The place is in a very quiet peaceful neighborhood and it is tucked away from the streets. I felt very safe and the little hideaway is decorated beautifully. Very very clean and Shawn responded back very quickly and even allowed and approved the extension of my stay. I found my home away from home!!!

My husband and I both felt very at home in Shawn's Broadmore Paradise close to Hospitals. First, I want to say that Shawn is wonderful host. He was extremely quick to reply and accept our reservation and was very accommodating to our needs once there.
This JEWEL is in a very quiet neighborhood, but close to everything.
It's behind the main house, but still very private.
There is a nice covered area with patio furniture to sit outside.
It seems like it would feel small inside, but the separate bedroom, bathroom, and laundry room, along with furniture placement throughout makes it this guest house quite spacious... lots of room to move around in the kitchen too.
Everything was neat, clean, and tastefully decorated. The sofa and chairs in the living room were very comfortable. We had Great water pressure and nice HOT water almost immediately in the bathroom. We slept deeply in the quiet, dark bedroom.
If I could give it more than 5 stars, I would.
We definitely plan to stay here again.

Shawn was very friendly, easy to talk to and if I had a questions he responded quickly. The house was very clean and inviting. I was in town for my CT registry and it was just 7 min away which was perfect for early morning commute and anything else we wanted to do was within a 10 min drive.
Traveling for work and the place was great. Shawn was easy to talk to and quick to respond to questions we had.
A great little house! The hosts were super kind and responsive, and our time was great! Would recommend!

Shawn was so helpful and accomodating. We arrived an hour earlier than expected and Shawn had no problem with letting us check in early. He answered all of my questions within minutes of me asking them and always ended his communication with, "Let me know if there is anything else that i can help you with."
His home is very clean, cozy and accomodating. He keeps it well stocked with all that you could possibly need. The neighborhood is beatifully lined with trees, yards are well groomed and the peace that you feel when entering and leaving the property is wonderful. The location is great and close to everything.
We would definitly stay at Shawn's place again.
The location was perfect, also appreciated how clean it was.
Hasn't disappointed and definitely my go-to.
The place was great! Real quiet neighborhood, will definitely be staying again.
Great place to stay, will book again without any hesitation.
Enjoyed my stay, Shawn is a super host, friendly and helpful. Looking forward to additional stays when in this area! Encourage everyone to give it a try, you want be disappointed. Tom
Peaceful, beautiful casita! Wonderful host - no bother, no complications, very smooth welcoming and exit. Highly recommend!
Great space and great value. Shawn was a very responsive host.
Shawn was very helpful and responded almost immediately when I had a question!
Loved the place and was in a good area!

I have stayed here twice and the quality has been consistent each time. It's quiet, safe, very clean, and has amenities that you could not get from most if not all of the hotels in Shreveport. I'm speaking as someone who lived in that Shreveport area for years and knows the quality of hotels around the area..which aren't even halfway decent no matter the price you pay. I'll definitely be using again!
Great place! Enjoyed my stay there.
It’s wonderful!! Would absolutely come again! Extremely comfortable!
The place is absolutely perfect for traveling by yourself or with an s/o. It’ll have everything you ever need!! If I could rent the place and live in it I would!
Awsome place and terrific host! It was clean and close to everything we wanted to get to.

The space is very warm and cozy as far aesthetics go. It's a guest house and it was well stocked, from plates, to seasonings and cook-ware it definitely feels like home in a sense. Not to mention she replies to messages super fast and you can tell overall she cares about her guests and their experience. I would definitely use this place again.

We absolutely loved this apartment. It was located on a quiet street and backed up to a golf course. Lots of restaurants and stores near. My husband and I plan to book again on our next trip to Shreveport.
This was a quaint lil place for our two day stay. It was a nice neighborhood. The location was great for shopping and close to everything we needed.
Lovely place to stay in a great location! Clean, comfortable, and plenty of space. Loved the peaceful morning walk to the nearby bakery for coffee and breakfast.
Nice newer place, host response was always quick!

Stayed here for two weeks and would definitely stay here again! The location is perfect--quiet, beautiful neighborhood and a lot of privacy yet just minutes from shopping and restaurants. Very cozy and fully furnished which made a huge difference for a long stay like mine. Check in and check out was quick and easy. Absolutely zero complaints about the entire experience!

My stay was just as advertised. I am a solo traveler so the safe and quiet neighborhood was a 5 star. The place is really decorated very very nicely. It felt like a home away from home feel. Would definitely book again!
Great place to stay highly recommend
The house was excellent. Best airbnb I have stayed in. Will be back again when I'm in town.
nice clean quite place good stay
Place was clean and beautiful. I liked that it also has a washer and dryer unit. It was very helpful.
We enjoyed our stay. Location was great. A nice and homey feel with several amenities. Shawn was also easy to communicate with. Would stay there again.

Shawn was a great host, and we loved this quiet little place!! The neighborhood was nice and quiet. This place was clean, fresh, and very comfortable. Our host was very communicative and we knew exactly what to do for everything! We will definitely stay here again.
A great, quiet , comfortable , and clean place to stay . It's close to shopping and restaurants . A home away for home . Thanks for a great stay .

Shawn’s place was great - very good location to restaurants, very clean and easy check in and out. Bed is a temperpedic style mattress and we loved it. Full size fridge was very handy as was the large sink. Washer/Dryer was convenient as well. Had a great stay. Highly recommend.
Enjoyed the stay and would come back

Review from a traveling nurse who frequents many places: This is a great little place to stay. Very safe, quiet, and clean! The hosts focused their attention on all the right things to make my stay comfortable. The mattress was high quality as well as the linens. Kitchen was well equipped and they even had coffee, cream and sugar for the Keurig waiting. Perfect touch! Highlight of my stay, being an avid golfer, was that it is butted up next to a golf course and every morning and evening I would gather balls in the yard!! It was like an Easter egg hunt and I have some great Taylormades, and Calloway’s that should get me through the summer!!
Was nice quite comfortable place

Wonderful place to stay. Was exactly like the photos, in a nice neighborhood, plenty of amenities. Had everything I could ask for in a cozy little apartment.
Shawn was a great host, offered anything he could do to help at a moment’s notice, without ever being intrusive. Was a delight.
Definitely would stay here again.
Nice place, quiet neighborhood.
Shawn our host had a great place, clean and convenient to everything. Bed was extremely comfortable. Will definitely be back in June.
Shawn was great and always responded quickly. The place was clean and exactly as advertised. Would definitely recommend to anyone staying in the Shreveport area
A beautiful living space in a good neighborhood. It was nice to come back here after a long day. Would definitely recommend!
Wonderful stay! It was absolutely beautiful and Shawn was very helpful! Absolutely loved my stay, would stay again and would recommend staying here as well!
Great place to stay. Shawn was very nice and accessible during our stay. The apartment was very clean and comfortable. We will definitely stay there again when in the area.
Great location and nice cozy property!

Shawn’s AirBnB is in a lovely, quiet neighbourhood, adjacent to a golf course and within walking distance of outdoor tennis and pickle ball courts. It’s a 5 minute drive to many amenities including Whole Foods, Target, WalMart, CVS and many restaurants/fast food. The place itself is well-maintained, as advertised, and had everything I needed. I had no issues. Shawn is a great host!

This is a very clean, cute newly renovated accommodation that is in a great location! It has everything you’d need. I will definitely rent again when I head to Shreveport. Shawn communicated all details to make our stay super easy.
Great place to stay. It is a good location, clean, comfortable, and quiet. Will book again the next time I’m in the area.
Neat, clean and quiet. Perfect for my stay! Shawn was a great host.
Just amazing place! Close to everything. Very clean! Would definitely stay again

Loved our stay at Shawn's home. He provided everything we needed and the place was very clean and well kept. Bed was comfortable and good water pressure in the shower. Nice touch having the coded door lock as I hate having to use keys. Will definitely stay again here if we are in the area. Thanks again!
Great space, great location and a great host.

Cozy place in a great location. All the furniture and looks brand me. Tastefully decorated. Comfy bed. Quiet neighborhood next to a golf course. Close to tons of shopping and a huge variety of food choices, plus a full kitchen of you feel like cooking for yourself. Shawn's communication was great. Easy to reach with any questions. Definitely would stay again and recommend to others.

Shawn, was a great host, he checked in with me to see if there was anything I needed. The location to his place is very convenient great shopping and restaurants.
The place was very clean and welcoming and he had all the amenities need to make a comfortable stay.
I would recommend his place to stay.

Great neighborhood, very quiet. Perfect for a couple’s getaway. Clean and looked newly renovated. Only con was it being located directly behind the owner’s actual house. I don’t recall it being in the description. Owner seemed cool, however if I had known this, I most likely wouldn’t have booked. Despite this, if I had to visit Shreveport again, I would definitely book here again.
Great place! Right near everything! Place was very clean with everything we needed.
Shawn’s place was really nice and cozy with pretty decor. We really enjoyed our stay.

This host’s place is a successful garage renovation turned into a clean and thoughtfully decorated one bedroom bungalow. It is situated behind his nicely landscaped home. I must warn you that the host must invest in a actual mattress in the bedroom. The hard foam left my body numb and my back in knots. I thought my son booked 1 day, to find out I had to stay two days, I almost cried. I paid higher than average housekeeping fees thinking it would add convenience to our checkout. Upon check out we were asked by the host to remove bedding, bring garbage to his curbside, clean this and clean that. Him giving us NEW house rules to do the job of a housekeeper is when I realized his housekeeping fee was a sham. Just a heads up there is no dishwasher and the Ice Machine on the fridge is broken. He also texted us “Don’t leave anything behind as I will not be returned it to you.” This was undiscerning. You will NEVER get repeat guests with an attitude of Ray Liotta in Goodfellas the movie, “F you pay me.” This is NOT what I have come to expect from any Airbnb host. This is not what the Airbnb community is about!
Shawn’s rental was exactly as advertised. It was well-appointed, clean and beautifully decorated.

I had a great stay at Shawn’s place! It was perfect for my visit to Shreveport! The Broadmoor area location is perfect - in a beautiful, quiet neighborhood, yet walking distance to restaurants and shopping.
The interior appears to be brand-new! Beautifully decorated, spacious, and equipped with everything you might need. I appreciated the fluffy white towels, the thoughtful touches in the kitchen, and the tasteful decor throughout the place. The bed is super-comfortable, with high-quality linens - I slept great! Everything in Shawn’s place was spotlessly clean, which I really appreciated traveling at this time.
Shawn was a perfect host, always quick to answer any questions I had. I hope to stay again, and I highly recommend!!! Thanks, Shawn!
Cozy backyard bungalow with a very comfortable bed and space. Clean, well appointed and worth the price. I would stay again.

Wow, what can I say? This is a hidden gem in Shreveport with amazingly hospitable hosts. This was my first airbnb experience, and I would definitely recommend Grant and Lauren’s listings to anyone looking to stay in Shreveport.
The price was well worth it for the private cottage with access to the pool, sauna, and conscience the location.
Great little stay for the night. Thanks so much!
Great place to stay while visiting Shreveport!
Great location, great appeal, great everything.

Grant and Lauren were fabulous hosts! I loved how calm and peaceful the space was. It was quiet enough for me to work without distraction and I slept great. The space was exactly as described and the bed was really comfy with lots of pillows to choose from. While I did not swim in the pool or use the sauna the additional amenities were great. I loved the extra touches such as water bottles in the fridge and a tide pod to wash clothes. Lauren even gave me more water bottles half way thru the week which was amazing. Finally, the surrounding neighborhood was beautiful to walk around in and stretch the legs. When I return to the area I will definitely stay again.

The cottage is very attractive, spacious, and thoughtfully appointed. It is located in a nice residential part of town and we felt very comfortable walking around the neighborhood. We really like eating at Orlandeaux's and had a large, late lunch. We skipped dinner, so no comments on places to eat nearby. We did enjoy coffee at Rhino Coffee (uptown location) in the morning on way out. Yes, if we come this way again, we would like to stay here again and would definitely recommend it to friends.
Great place! This will be my top choice when I am in town!

Grant and Lauren were fantastic hosts! they were so quick to respond with and questions or needs we had! they're little cottage was very clean and we did not hesitate to step inside! would highly recommend this little gem! we are from the country so was concerned about noice, but this little spot was surprisingly peaceful for being in a city! Thank you both for sharing your place with us!! It was great meeting you!!

Great spot, in a beautiful neighborhood
Close enough to everything you need and we had a very easy time getting all the places we needed to between the event we were attending and family we were meeting.
Everything exactly as described and they were super quick to answer questions through messaging.
Definitely get breakfast at Strawns which is right around the corner(a 4 min walk) and save room for pie
Exactly what you need for an overnight stay!
Awesome space. Very quiet. Super clean. Photos match space. Grant was super nice. I will definitely stay there again.
This place was so charming and welcoming. It was the perfect place to stay for a quick weekend get away. Very quiet, clean, and comfortable. Would definitely recommend!!

My friend and I stayed here for a couple nights while visiting Shreveport and we were very happy with the experience! It is a very cute little spot in the host's backyard complete with all the amenities you could possibly need including washer & drier. They had a lovely pool available though it rained almost the whole time we stayed, but would have loved the opportunity to swim otherwise. Spoke with the host, Grant, a little bit before we left and he was very friendly. The location is very cozy and fun. There were lots of good recommendations for food and other fun activities. I would definitely recommend this spot to a friend and if I'm ever back in town I would be very happy to stay with this airbnb again.
When I need to see clients again in Shreveport this is going to be the first place I look for. Nice place to stay. Highly recommend it.

This place was so cute and affordable for me and my husband. It was easy to get into and the instructions were very clear. We didn’t end up swimming due to the pool being cold but was able to lay out and read. The place was very clean on the inside. It had cute colorful lighting in the shower.
Really quiet & nice street. Felt very safe and private. Really nice for 1-2 people.

Grants place was in a beautiful historic walkable neighborhood. The outdoor space was perfect for sitting outside. The sauna was a great perk too. We will definitely stay here again and next time use the pool. Grant came out to say hi which was nice to meet the host. You can tell that they take pride in their home and the rental.
Beautiful spot. Private. Pool, sauna. Conveniently located.
Very relaxing and comfortable stay. It was quiet, the shower was hot, and the bed was really comfortable- just what I needed!
Highly recommend!! Lovely place! Very responsive and was willing to accommodate a slightly later check-out as a storm was rolling through, although I ended up not needing the extra time anyway.
Everything was Perfect!! We will definitely be staying here again!!
Id book again. I highly recommended.
The cottage is in a great and quiet location. Very cozy and clean space. Communication was clear. I highly recommend it!
Second time booking here!! I love it. The sauna is perfect and great location.

Grant's place is just lovely, perfect for my quick stopover. The neighborhood is really nice, one you could go for a run or walk in to get some activity. The cottage is very cute, the bed so comfortable, and the shower was so nice. The hosts were very nice and super responsive. check in was super easy and well described. I really enjoyed my stay in this quiet little cottage!
We only stayed for a night. The little cottage is a beautiful set up & I think the interior is well thought out. We enjoyed our stay.
Definitely one of the best stays I’ve had with air bnb. Linens and restroom were so clean. I felt right at home. No crazy chore list was great!

I needed a place to sleep that was close to a certain destination for an event so this was perfect. It is so cute !!! The hosts are very nice and made sure I had everything I needed. I would book again when I need to come back to Shreveport.

Phenomenal hosts, this stay was extremely comfortable and cozy. Accessing the cottage was simple, the cottage itself was spotless, the bed was comfortable, the water got warm and had great pressure. Grant was a wonderful host, he was very responsive and helpful. I highly recommend this to anyone looking for a small comfortable place to stay.

Host was very responsive. Room was clean. Having shampoo, conditioner and body wash in the bathroom would be a nice touch. Appreciated having coffee creamer available with the coffee. Nice to have access to the sauna too. This was not a concern for us, but it might be helpful for others to know. These accommodates would not be accessible for anyone with a physical disability since you have to cross a brick/stone pathway and climb steps to enter the room. We would stay in this airbnb again!
Thoroughly enjoyed our short stay. Very Homey and clean. Grant and his wife are great and responsive. Thanks again y’all

Grant and Lauren were both wonderful! The place was cozy, neat, and easy to access. They even went the extra mile when I forgot my luggage! They acted swiftly and kindly and my luggage is on its way home the very same day I left. Thanks for the assistance!

Cozy and peaceful little spot. The main thing I look for when traveling is cleanliness and quiet and this had both. Grant was very nice upon my arrival. I enjoyed my stay and will book again next time I’m in town.
Was a great stay, nice clean cottage. Nice area!
Awesome place to stay! The sauna is wonderful. The bed is comfy. Private. Book it. You won’t be disappointed.

it was really nice to get to stay here. we didnt get a chance to use the pool but it was a nice option. I really liked how we were close to everything in town but in a quiet area. the only problem we had was the gate lock box but that very well could have been user error.
Great space! Will recommend to others.
A beautiful cottage that looks just like the pictures. Would gladly stay there again
